009
010package imagingbook.common.threshold.adaptive;
011
012import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
013import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.DialogLabel;
014import imagingbook.common.threshold.global.OtsuThresholder;
015import imagingbook.common.util.ParameterBundle;
016
017/**
018 * <p>
019 * This adaptive thresholder splits the image into non-overlapping square
020 * sub-images, computes the optimal threshold within each sub-image (using a
021 * {@link OtsuThresholder}) and interpolates linearly between these local
022 * thresholds. See also Sec. 9.4 of [1] for a description.
023 * </p>
024 * <p>
025 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An
026 * Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
027 * </p>
028 * 
029 * @author WB
030 * @version 2022/08/01
031 */
032public class InterpolatingThresholder implements AdaptiveThresholder {
033        
034        /**
035         * Parameters for class {@link InterpolatingThresholder}.
036         */
037        public static class Parameters implements ParameterBundle<InterpolatingThresholder> {
038                @DialogLabel("Tile size")
039                public int tileSize = 32;
040                
041                @DialogLabel("Background mode")
042                public BackgroundMode bgMode = BackgroundMode.DARK;
043        }
044        
045        private final Parameters params;
046        
047        public InterpolatingThresholder() {
048                this.params = new Parameters();
049        }
050        
051        public InterpolatingThresholder(Parameters params) {
052                this.params = params;
053        }
054
055        @Override
056        public ByteProcessor getThreshold(ByteProcessor ip) {
057                final int W = ip.getWidth();
058                final int H = ip.getHeight();
059                final int tileSize = params.tileSize;
060                
061                // determine number of tiles
062                int nW = (W % tileSize == 0) ? (W / tileSize + 1) : (W / tileSize + 2);
063                int nH = (H % tileSize == 0) ? (H / tileSize + 1) : (H / tileSize + 2);
064                
065                int[][] tiles = new int[nW][nH];
066                int s0 = tileSize / 2;  // center of title (s0 + s1 = tileSize)
067//              int s1 = tileSize - s0;
068
069                // compute threshold for each tile
070                int[] h = new int[256];
071                OtsuThresholder thr = new OtsuThresholder();
072
073                int q_ = (params.bgMode == BackgroundMode.DARK) ? 256 : 0;
074
075                for (int j = 0, v0 = 0; j < nH; j++, v0 += tileSize) {
076                        for (int i = 0, u0 = 0; i < nW; i++, u0 += tileSize) {
077                                getSubimageHistogram(ip, u0 - s0, v0 - s0, tileSize, h);
078                                int q = thr.getThreshold(h);
079                                if (q < 0) q = q_; // no threshold found in this tile
080                                tiles[i][j] = q;
081                                //IJ.log(i + "/" + j + ": " + q);
082                        }
083                }
084                
085                ByteProcessor thrIp = new ByteProcessor(W, H);
086                
087                for (int j = 0, v0 = 0; j < nH; j++, v0 += tileSize) {
088                        for (int i = 0, u0 = 0; i < nW; i++, u0 += tileSize) {
089                                // Rectangle re = new Rectangle(u0-s0, v0-s0, u0-s0+tileSize, v0-s0+tileSize);
090                                for (int v = v0 - s0; v < v0 - s0 + tileSize; v++) {
091                                        for (int u = u0 - s0; u < u0 - s0 + tileSize; u++) {
092                                                thrIp.putPixel(u, v, tiles[i][j]);
093                                        }
094                                }
095                        }
096                }
097                
098                // linearly interpolate
099                for (int j = 0, v0 = 0; j < nH - 1; j++, v0 += tileSize) {
100                        for (int i = 0, u0 = 0; i < nW - 1; i++, u0 += tileSize) {
101                                int A = tiles[i][j];
102                                int B = tiles[i + 1][j];
103                                int C = tiles[i][j + 1];
104                                int D = tiles[i + 1][j + 1];
105
106                                // interpolate within [u0, v0, u0 + tileSize, v0 + tileSize]
107                                for (int v = v0; v < v0 + tileSize; v++) {
108                                        double dy = (double) (v - v0) / tileSize;
109                                        double AC = A + dy * (C - A);
110                                        double BD = B + dy * (D - B);
111                                        for (int u = u0; u < u0 + tileSize; u++) {
112                                                double dx = (double) (u - u0) / tileSize;
113                                                double ABCD = AC + dx * (BD - AC);
114                                                // thrIp.putPixel(u,v,tiles[i][j]);
115                                                thrIp.putPixel(u, v, (int) Math.rint(ABCD));
116                                        }
117                                }
118
119                        }
120                }
121                        
122                return thrIp;
123        }
124        
125        private void getSubimageHistogram(ByteProcessor ip, int u0, int v0, int size, int[] h) {
126                for (int i = 0; i < h.length; i++) {
127                        h[i] = 0;
128                }
129                for (int v = v0; v < v0 + size; v++) {
130                        for (int u = u0; u < u0 + size; u++) {
131                                int p = getPaddedPixel(ip, u, v);
132                                h[p]++;
133                        }
134                }
135        }
136        
137        // TODO: change to use ImageAccessor!
138        private int getPaddedPixel(ByteProcessor bp, int u, int v) {
139                final int w = bp.getWidth();
140                final int h = bp.getHeight();
141                if (u < 0)
142                        u = 0;
143                else if (u >= w)
144                        u = w - 1;
145                if (v < 0)
146                        v = 0;
147                else if (v >= h)
148                        v = h - 1;
149                return bp.get(u, v);
150        }
151
152}
